ygData.subject: Lack of Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: As a Bard I know melee isnt our strong point..but I would like to weild some decent 1h slash weapons.. Currently I weild a PGT and a Dirk but I m not so
ygData.messageBody:
As a Bard I know melee isnt our strong point..but I would like to weild
some decent 1h slash weapons.. Currently I weild a PGT and a Dirk but I'm
not so satisfied with the RP and Look of these weapons.. The tomahawk while
having a wonderful effect isnt the best looking weapon around.. what I want
are 2 swords...One long and One short in the offhand.. Why are they're no
decent 1h slash bladed weapons in this game? Every blade is high level 40+
and Combine are way to slow to be effective with our allready feeble melee
skills.
I wish there was a comperable Langseax 1h weapon for mid level bards.

Kagami
